Total Time: 25 minutes
 Category: Dinner
 
 Serving Size: 5
 
 Ingredients:
 1 1/4 lb. salmon fillet
 2 tbsp. olive oil
 2 tsp. chopped basil
 2 tsp. chopped parsley
 1/4 tsp. salt
 1/8 tsp. pepper
 1 lemon
 

Instructions:
 1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Spray a baking sheet, lay the salmon skin side down on the baking sheet.
 2. Stir together the olive oil, basil, parsley, salt, and pepper. 3. Zest the lemon, and add the zest to the oil. Pour the herbs and oil over the salmon. 
 4. Thinly slice the lemon. Place lemon slices over the salmon. 
 5. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes.
 6. Enjoy!
